attributes.review: This is the worst and most disgusting app ever. Don’t download neither try to read the info for it. I’d feel bad if people voted for Mr Orange because then America would be known for having a racist as our president. He locks up and sexually abuse children and yet hides in his bunker. Y’all who stay silent about this matter are the problem. Never listen to his lies because he just makes me want to vomit🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮. That is why you shouldn’t waste your time on his app. PERIOD.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: The second I opened the app my phone started to crash, I don’t have an old phone so it’s not that, I also saw an Orange big fat Oompa Loompa looking thing, I would say he needs a skincare routine to try and prevent wrinkles but I think it’s too late for that, I also suggested for my grandma to download the app and the second she clicked it she saw the thing that I saw and she had a heart attack, luckily we got her to the hospital quick enough but if u don’t want to have a heart attack don’t download this app
attributes.title: No🖤☺️

attributes.review: I downloaded the app so I could be an informed voter for the 2020 election. However, this app has proven to be one of the worst ones on the market. It is meant to show how good of a person trump is.... yet it does the exact opposite. This app needs major improvement or better yet! It should be deleted. I would give 0 stars if that was an option because even 1/2 of a star is too nice.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: Take it away I dare you👺
I hate this app and I am not part of the whole Gen Z thing but this was genuinely a horrible formatted app did not help at all😏😉Apple please remove this app👿🤡
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app is terrible and disgusting I hate it So much If I could this would be a 0 star app
attributes.title: DELETE NOW

attributes.review: okay so i downloaded this app so i can support my racist, misogynistic, sexist, rapist, sex trafficker orange❤️and when i downloaded the app i was introduced with the oranges face and he threatened me that if i didn’t vote for him he would kill me🙄(keep in mind i’m 5) so then i just deleted the app because i didn’t want to die and then somehow the app re-downloaded by itself and my dog opened my phone there was a bunch of flashing lights and he had a seizure and died😡i was absolutely infuriated i had that dog since i was 3 and he died MY POOR BABY DIED (i’m sorry i’m crying while writing this let me recollect myself😓) and eventually the orange came to my house and killed me (i’m writing this from hell) so now me and my dog are in hell because of this app, i do not recommend getting this app😞
attributes.title: my dog died from this app😔💯
